title: Bitzlato crypto exchange co-founder pleads guilty to AML violations
description: Russian co-founder of crypto exchange Bitzlato, Anatoly Legkodymov, pleaded guilty to money laundering charges. According to a press release published by the U.S. Department of Justice (DoJ) on Dec. 6, 2023 Legkodymov pleaded guilty to operating a money transmitting business…

title: JP Morgan CEO Urges US Govt. to Pull the Plug on Bitcoin
description:
Jamie Dimon, CEO of JP Morgan Chase, has said he would “close down” Bitcoin if he had the power and authority to do so. On Wednesday, the top American banker told lawmakers that Bitcoin’s true use case is in criminal activities.  During Wednesday’s congressional hearing, Dimon told lawmakers he has always opposed crypto, Bitcoin, etc. […]

The post JP Morgan CEO Urges US Govt. to Pull the Plug on Bitcoin appeared first on Coin Edition.
